name: Atlantean Kotal Kahn
description: The noble ruler of ancient Atlantis, blessed with the power of the ocean depths. His mastery over water and light magic makes him a formidable ally in the fight to save his homeland.

abilities.name: Sunburst
abilities.description: Heals all allies (including self) for 200 + 22Ã—Sunlight stacks. Each enemy has a 30% chance to take magical damage equal to 50% of this heal. Consumes all Sunlight.

abilities.name: Solar Bulwark
abilities.description: For 2 turns: Sets Kotal Kahn's armor & magic resistance to 80 and redirects all ally damage to him.

abilities.name: Blood Sacrifice
abilities.description: Sets Sunlight to 100 and Kotal Kahn sacrifices 50% of his current HP. Does not end turn.

passive.name: Solar Ascendance
passive.description: Kotal Kahn gathers Sunlight whenever he inflicts or receives damage, up to 100.
